area_raw: cube of dirt 5 feet across or smaller
markdown:
**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 257 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Deities** [Kabriri](/Deities.aspx?ID=432), [Magrim](/Deities.aspx?ID=450), [Sairazul](/Deities.aspx?ID=694) **Range** touch **Area** cube of dirt 5 feet across or smaller --- You remove loose dirt, dust, gravel, sand, and the like (though not solid stone) up to the size of a 5-foot cube. Any Medium or smaller creature standing atop the earth when the spell is cast must attempt a Reflex save or [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) check. **Success** The creature is unaffected and can choose to either descend the pit without damage or move to the nearest available space of its choice.
**Failure** The creature falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88) in the nearest available space of its choice or falls into the pit if it prefers.
**Critical Failure** The creature falls into the pit excavated by the spell and lands prone, taking falling damage as normal. --- **Heightened (+2)** The spell can excavate an additional 5-foot cube of earth. If you excavate all four 5-foot cubes beneath a Large creature, it must attempt a Reflex save or Acrobatics check, as above.
name: Expeditious Excavation

summary: You remove loose dirt, dust, gravel, sand, and the like (though not solid stone) up to the size of a 5-foot cube.
summary_markdown: You remove loose dirt, dust, gravel, sand, and the like (though not solid stone) up to the size of a 5-foot cube.
text: Expeditious Excavation Two Actions Source Divine Mysteries pg. 257 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Kabriri, Magrim, Sairazul Range touch Area cube of dirt 5 feet across or smaller --- You remove loose dirt, dust, gravel, sand, and the like (though not solid stone) up to the size of a 5-foot cube. Any Medium or smaller creature standing atop the earth when the spell is cast must attempt a Reflex save or Acrobatics check. Success The creature is unaffected and can choose to either descend the pit without damage or move to the nearest available space of its choice. Failure The creature falls prone in the nearest available space of its choice or falls into the pit if it prefers. Critical Failure The creature falls into the pit excavated by the spell and lands prone, taking falling damage as normal. --- Heightened (+2) The spell can excavate an additional 5-foot cube of earth. If you excavate all four 5-foot cubes beneath a Large creature, it must attempt a Reflex save or Acrobatics check, as above.
